resources.string: A notification channel for eMobilePOS application.
No Products have been added, try again
Signature Require Mode Is Enabled, Please Enter Signature
Are you sure you want to exit?
An error occurred while getting Ingenico\'s credentials.

Device not available, please turn it on (keep green
button pressed for three seconds) and hit Connect.

Note: Wait until the Bluetooth logo appears in the
upper left corner of the device's screen to continue.
Please turn the payment device on (keep green\nbutton pressed for three seconds) and try again.
Ingenico\'s user login failed. Please check credentials and try again.

Do you wish to add more products?

Printing failed please verify printer status.\nWould you like to retry printing?

Apparently there are communication problems with the terminal.

TIME OUT, would you like to try again?
Transaction ID and Tip Amount are required.
Split station print receipt by categories
The selected dinning table needs to be assigned.
TIME OUT, would you like to try again?
The selected payment type is not valid along with store & forward.
Claimed orders can not be opened.
Use of the System Password will disable the Clerks function. To re-enable the use of Clerks, go to Settings>>Admin Settings>>General Settings and select Use Clerks
Use clerk setting is required to open this section.
Use clerk setting is required to complete this action.
